Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat(beta): Complete Phase 3 - Beta Testing Program

Implemented comprehensive beta testing infrastructure with 5 core systems:

## Beta Program Components

### 1. Application & Selection (application.py)
- Automated beta tester application processing
- Multi-criteria scoring system (100-point scale):
  * Trading experience (0-25 points)
  * Platform knowledge (0-20 points)
  * Feedback commitment (0-20 points)
  * Availability (0-15 points)
  * Motivation assessment (0-20 points)
- Auto-acceptance/waitlist/rejection with email notifications
- Capacity management (max 10 testers)
- Application statistics and reporting

### 2. Feedback Collection (feedback.py)
- Multi-channel feedback submission (Telegram, email, web)
- Feedback types: bug reports, feature requests, general, satisfaction
- Automated categorization into 5 categories
- Priority calculation (high/medium/low)
- Weekly satisfaction surveys with week-specific questions
- Auto-escalation of high-priority issues
- Feedback summaries and top feature request tracking
- Response rate and resolution time metrics

### 3. Performance Monitoring (monitoring.py)
- Real-time signal accuracy tracking (95%+ target)
- User engagement metrics and activity monitoring
- System health tracking (API latency, uptime, error rate)
- Automated anomaly detection with alerts
- Dashboard data for visualization
- Performance trends analysis (7-day rolling)
- Daily/weekly report generation with AI insights
- Optimization suggestions based on metrics

### 4. Signal Optimization (optimizer.py)
- Real-world performance data collection
- Parameter optimization via grid search:
  * Quantum qubits (3-6)
  * Circuit shots (512-4096)
  * Confidence thresholds (0.80-0.95)
  * Risk-reward ratios (1.5-3.0)
- Symbol-specific performance analysis
- Confidence level correlation analysis
- Time-of-day trading patterns
- Automated A/B testing recommendations
- Expected improvement calculations
- Gradual rollout support

### 5. Beta Graduation (graduation.py)
- Success criteria evaluation (4 criteria, need 3/4):
  * Min 3 feedback submissions
  * 70%+ engagement rate
  * 3/4 weekly surveys completed
  * 21+ days active
- Two-tier reward system:
  * Successful: 50% lifetime discount + 1 bonus month + 3 referral credits
  * Participated: 30% discount for 6 months + 1 referral credit
- Automated discount code generation
- Personalized graduation emails
- Referral credit system (R500 per credit)
- Batch graduation processing
- Conversion tracking and analytics
- 60%+ target conversion rate

## Testing Infrastructure

### Phase 2 Validation (test_automation.py)
- Lead qualification testing (hot/warm/cold leads)
- Customer support agent validation
- Content generation verification
- Onboarding workflow testing
- Analytics agent validation
- Full orchestrator testing

### Phase 3 Validation (test_beta_program.py)
- Beta application system end-to-end tests
- Feedback collection and categorization tests
- Performance monitoring validation
- Signal optimization algorithm tests
- Beta graduation and reward calculation tests
- Complete workflow integration tests

## Documentation

### Beta Tester Guide (BETA_PROGRAM.md)
- Comprehensive onboarding instructions
- Telegram bot setup walkthrough
- Signal interpretation guide
- Feedback submission methods
- Weekly survey schedule and topics
- Success criteria and reward tiers
- FAQs covering all common questions
- Support contact information
- Trading risk disclaimers

## Technical Improvements

- Fixed SubscriptionService import (now SubscriptionManager)
- Added SignalOptimizer to quantum_engine exports
- Integrated all beta modules into beta_program package
- Comprehensive error handling throughout
- Graceful degradation when services unavailable
- Mock data fallbacks for testing

## Metrics & Targets

- **Signal Accuracy**: 95%+ (tracked real-time)
- **Beta Conversion Rate**: 60%+ target
- **Response Time**: <24 hours for feedback
- **System Uptime**: 99%+ target
- **User Engagement**: 70%+ target
- **Survey Completion**: 75%+ target

## Next Steps (Phase 4: Launch)

Ready to proceed with:
1. Landing page and marketing site
2. Payment integration testing
3. Production deployment setup
4. Beta tester recruitment campaign
5. Launch preparation checklist
